events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but it doesn't fit at all. I'd like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request involves a refund due to sizing issues, so this case is categorized under Refund.
Case has been assigned to agent Sarah K. to handle the refund request and provide assistance.
Hello! I'm Sarah, and I'll be helping you with your refund request for the jacket that didn't fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the product has been opened or worn?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is still in its original packaging and hasn't been worn or damaged.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately once we receive the returned jacket.
Great, thank you for the quick response! I will send the jacket back today and await the refund.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount reflected in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you!
